\newcommand{\ottdrule}[4][]{{\displaystyle\frac{\begin{array}{l}#2\end{array}}{#3}\quad\ottdrulename{#4}}}
\newcommand{\ottusedrule}[1]{\[#1\]}
\newcommand{\ottpremise}[1]{ #1 \\}
\newenvironment{ottdefnblock}[3][]{ \framebox{\mbox{#2}} \quad #3 \\[0pt]}{}
\newenvironment{ottfundefnblock}[3][]{ \framebox{\mbox{#2}} \quad #3 \\[0pt]\begin{displaymath}\begin{array}{l}}{\end{array}\end{displaymath}}
\newcommand{\ottfunclause}[2]{ #1 \equiv #2 \\}
\newcommand{\ottnt}[1]{\mathit{#1}}
\newcommand{\ottmv}[1]{\mathit{#1}}
\newcommand{\ottkw}[1]{\mathbf{#1}}
\newcommand{\ottsym}[1]{#1}
\newcommand{\ottcom}[1]{\text{#1}}
\newcommand{\ottdrulename}[1]{\textsc{#1}}
\newcommand{\ottcomplu}[5]{\overline{#1}^{\,#2\in #3 #4 #5}}
\newcommand{\ottcompu}[3]{\overline{#1}^{\,#2<#3}}
\newcommand{\ottcomp}[2]{\overline{#1}^{\,#2}}
\newcommand{\ottgrammartabular}[1]{\begin{supertabular}{llcllllll}#1\end{supertabular}}
\newcommand{\ottmetavartabular}[1]{\begin{supertabular}{ll}#1\end{supertabular}}
\newcommand{\ottrulehead}[3]{$#1$ & & $#2$ & & & \multicolumn{2}{l}{#3}}
\newcommand{\ottprodline}[6]{& & $#1$ & $#2$ & $#3 #4$ & $#5$ & $#6$}
\newcommand{\ottfirstprodline}[6]{\ottprodline{#1}{#2}{#3}{#4}{#5}{#6}}
\newcommand{\ottlongprodline}[2]{& & $#1$ & \multicolumn{4}{l}{$#2$}}
\newcommand{\ottfirstlongprodline}[2]{\ottlongprodline{#1}{#2}}
\newcommand{\ottbindspecprodline}[6]{\ottprodline{#1}{#2}{#3}{#4}{#5}{#6}}
\newcommand{\ottprodnewline}{\\}
\newcommand{\ottinterrule}{\\[5.0mm]}
\newcommand{\ottafterlastrule}{\\}
\newcommand{\ottmetavars}{
\ottmetavartabular{

}}

\newcommand{\ottt}{
\ottrulehead{t}{::=}{\ottcom{types}}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottkw{h}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{type high}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{l}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{type low}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottsym{Γ}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{type either}}}

\newcommand{\ottex}{
\ottrulehead{ex}{::=}{\ottcom{expressions}}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottkw{v}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{e}}{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottformula}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{formula}}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottnt{judgement}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{h} \, \ottsym{∉}  \ottsym{vars(} \, \ottkw{e} \, \ottsym{)}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ex  \ottsym{:}  t}{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottC}{
\ottrulehead{C}{::=}{\ottcom{commands}}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottkw{skip}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{v} \, \ottsym{≔} \, \ottkw{e}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{C_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{;}  C_{{\mathrm{2}}}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{if} \, \ottkw{e} \, \ottkw{then} \, C_{{\mathrm{1}}} \, \ottkw{else} \, C_{{\mathrm{2}}}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{while} \, \ottkw{e} \, \ottkw{do} \, C}{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottG}{
\ottrulehead{G}{::=}{\ottcom{typing contexts}}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{}{}{}{}{\ottcom{empty}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{t}{}{}{}{\ottcom{command assumption}}}

\newcommand{\ottJtype}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{Jtype}}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottsym{⊢}  ex  \ottsym{:}  t}{}{}{}{\ottcom{expression typing}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{G  \ottsym{⊢}  C}{}{}{}{\ottcom{command typing}}}

\newcommand{\ottjudgement}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{judgement}}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottnt{Jtype}}{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottuserXXsyntax}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{user\_syntax}}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{t}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ex}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{formula}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{C}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{G}{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottgrammar}{\ottgrammartabular{
\ottt\ottinterrule
\ottex\ottinterrule
\ottformula\ottinterrule
\ottC\ottinterrule
\ottG\ottinterrule
\ottJtype\ottinterrule
\ottjudgement\ottinterrule
\ottuserXXsyntax\ottafterlastrule
}}

% defnss
% defns Jtype
%% defn exp_typing
\newcommand{\ottdruleEXXHigh}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\ottsym{⊢}  \ottkw{e}  \ottsym{:}  \ottkw{h}}{%
{\ottdrulename{E\_High}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleEXXLow}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottkw{h} \, \ottsym{∉}  \ottsym{vars(} \, \ottkw{e} \, \ottsym{)}}%
}{
\ottsym{⊢}  \ottkw{e}  \ottsym{:}  \ottkw{l}}{%
{\ottdrulename{E\_Low}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnexpXXtyping}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$\ottsym{⊢}  ex  \ottsym{:}  t$}{\ottcom{expression typing}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleEXXHigh{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleEXXLow{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}

%% defn com_typing
\newcommand{\ottdruleCXXSkip}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\ottsym{Γ}  \ottsym{⊢}  \ottkw{skip}}{%
{\ottdrulename{C\_Skip}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleCXXAssignOne}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottsym{⊢}  \ottkw{v}  \ottsym{:}  \ottkw{h}}%
}{
\ottsym{Γ}  \ottsym{⊢}  \ottkw{v} \, \ottsym{≔} \, \ottkw{e}}{%
{\ottdrulename{C\_Assign1}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleCXXAssignTwo}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottsym{⊢}  \ottkw{e}  \ottsym{:}  \ottkw{l}}%
}{
\ottkw{l}  \ottsym{⊢}  \ottkw{v} \, \ottsym{≔} \, \ottkw{e}}{%
{\ottdrulename{C\_Assign2}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleCXXSeq}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottsym{Γ}  \ottsym{⊢}  C_{{\mathrm{1}}}}%
\ottpremise{\ottsym{Γ}  \ottsym{⊢}  C_{{\mathrm{2}}}}%
}{
\ottsym{Γ}  \ottsym{⊢}  C_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{;}  C_{{\mathrm{2}}}}{%
{\ottdrulename{C\_Seq}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleCXXWhile}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottsym{⊢}  \ottkw{e}  \ottsym{:}  \ottsym{Γ}}%
\ottpremise{\ottsym{Γ}  \ottsym{⊢}  C}%
}{
\ottsym{Γ}  \ottsym{⊢}  \ottkw{while} \, \ottkw{e} \, \ottkw{do} \, C}{%
{\ottdrulename{C\_While}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleCXXIf}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottsym{⊢}  \ottkw{e}  \ottsym{:}  \ottsym{Γ}}%
\ottpremise{\ottsym{Γ}  \ottsym{⊢}  C_{{\mathrm{1}}}}%
\ottpremise{\ottsym{Γ}  \ottsym{⊢}  C_{{\mathrm{2}}}}%
}{
\ottsym{Γ}  \ottsym{⊢}  \ottkw{if} \, \ottkw{e} \, \ottkw{then} \, C_{{\mathrm{1}}} \, \ottkw{else} \, C_{{\mathrm{2}}}}{%
{\ottdrulename{C\_If}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleCXXSub}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottkw{h}  \ottsym{⊢}  C}%
}{
\ottkw{l}  \ottsym{⊢}  C}{%
{\ottdrulename{C\_Sub}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefncomXXtyping}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$G  \ottsym{⊢}  C$}{\ottcom{command typing}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleCXXSkip{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleCXXAssignOne{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleCXXAssignTwo{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleCXXSeq{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleCXXWhile{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleCXXIf{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleCXXSub{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}


\newcommand{\ottdefnsJtype}{
\ottdefnexpXXtyping{}\ottdefncomXXtyping{}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnss}{
\ottdefnsJtype
}

\newcommand{\ottall}{\ottmetavars\\[0pt]
\ottgrammar\\[5.0mm]
\ottdefnss}
